#summary Installation Process
<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />
= Introduction =
With version 1.5.2 a simple diagnostics page was included with the solution.

The page /mod/skillsoft/olsadiag.php

Will perform the following simple tests:

  # Check if the PHP SOAP Extension is enabled in the PHP.INI
  # Check that the OLSA Configuration settings have been entered
  # Check if the OLSA EndPoint URL can be accessed. This check also confirms if PHO OPENSSL is enabled in the PHP.INI if the EndPoint uses https://
  # Checks that a OLSA SOAP Client can be created
  # Checks that the OLSA Credentials are valid.
